detaileddescription.para: Update factor for first moment estimate.
Update factor for second moment estimate.
Small factor to avoid division by zero.

memberdef.argsstring: (lbann_comm *comm, DataType learning_rate, DataType beta1=DataType(0.9), DataType beta2=DataType(0.99), DataType eps=DataType(1e-8), cudnn::cudnn_manager *cudnn=nullptr)
memberdef.name: adam

detaileddescription.para: Get a human-readable description of the optimizer.
Perform the computation in an optimization step.
Adam optimizer. Reference: Kingma, D. and Ba, J. 2014. Adam: A Method for Stochastic Optimization.
